title: Jooler Factory
subtitle: E-commerce Platform
description: Jooler Factory is a website that sells handmade jewelry. The website is built with Angular. The backend is built with Python and Django. The database is MySQL Server. The website is hosted on Heroku.

title: Jooler ERP
subtitle: ERP System
description: Jooler ERP isa jewelry-focused ERP system designed to streamline inventory, order processing, and financial management. Built with Angular, TypeScript, SCSS, and Angular Material for a seamless UI, it leverages Django (Python) for the backend, MySQL for data management, and is hosted on Heroku. The platform enables efficient handling of custom orders, 3D models, invoices, and consignments, making jewelry business operations more intuitive and scalable.
